---
title: "Transformation report"
format:
  html:
    code-fold: true
execute: 
  echo: true
---

Import packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Read in the transformed data
```{r}
readRDS('../data/processed/data_transformed.RDS') %>% as_tibble() -> data_transformed
```

```{r}
data_transformed$age %>% 
  hist(main="age")

data_transformed$persons_in_household %>% 
  hist(
    breaks=6,
    main="persons in household")

data_transformed$number_of_years_of_education %>% 
  hist(
    breaks=6,
    main="number of years of education")

data_transformed$total_annual_income %>% 
  hist(main="total annual income")

data_transformed$general_health_status %>% 
  hist(
    breaks=5,
    main="general health status")

data_transformed$life_satisfaction %>% hist(
  breaks=5,
  main="life satisfaction")
```
